relevant_findings.general: Alert, tired appearing, diaphoretic, slightly jaundiced, dry mucous membranes.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Heart regular, no murmur, no S3, no S4, no JVD.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Lungs clear to auscultation with good air movement bilaterally, non-labored breathing.
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Abdomen soft, nontender, nondistended; percutaneous chole drain placed with minimal bloody drainage.
relevant_findings.skin: No obvious rashes or ulcerations noted.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, oriented, face symmetric, speech fluent, moves all limbs.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Vital signs show a range in blood pressure from normal to low, indicating possible hemodynamic instability.
